# Jordan condemns the terrorist operation in Istanbul # https://t.co/xQkz8Gmier # Turkey
I strongly condemn the terrorist attack that took place in Istanbul's Ortaköy district in the first hours of 2017.
My citizens who lost their lives in aggression want Allah's mercy, I remember with compassion our lost foreign guests.
The brutal assault in Istanbul made it clear that terrorism aims to infiltrate blood, to take life, to hurt life without discrimination.
We will never pass through these dirty games by keeping our coolness and mating with each other.
The start of 2017 has been terrible in Istanbul. We live intensely and have transferred our condolences to the Turkish government.
Turkey, which continues the struggle for terrorism, is determined to do what is necessary to ensure the security and peace of its citizens.
On the first day of the new year I condemn the terror attack and the mentality behind this pain and sorrow.
Wishing all my friends and family a very happy new year 2017.  May you and your families enjoy best of health and happiness. #maldives.

[DIRECT] Follow @fhollande's speech on the occasion of the inauguration of the renovated Richelieu spaces https://t.co/slVa2OjN4j
#directPR @fhollande "It took 10 years for the decision to launch the work to be taken in 2006."
#directPR @fhollande "This is a € 230 million operation, 80% of which is committed by the Ministry of Culture and 20% by Education"
#directPR @fhollande "From 2017 will begin the 2nd stage of work to give the whole of its amplitude to 2020"
#directPR @fhollande "The BNF watches over one of the most important collections in the world and is the guardian of our memory"
#directPR @fhollande "The idea was to gather all these libraries to maintain the link between the French and the book"
#directPR @fhollande "A plan for reading was launched in 2014, especially to support communities"
#directPR @fhollande "The topic of opening public libraries was important to me."
#directPR @fhollande "We wanted to support this effort to disseminate reading and concern all territories"
#directPR @fhollande "I want to highlight the launch of the night of reading on January 14, 1200 events will be organized"
#directPR @fhollande "Bookstores do public work, they are places of culture and sharing."
#directPR @fhollande "The government has set up a plan of 11 million to promote literary expression in these bookstores"
#directPR @fhollande "Publishing is the first French cultural export industry, even if it remains fragile"
#directPR @fhollande "Digital can be the best thing, but it has changed the mode of transmission of works"
#directPR @fhollande "The music industry is experiencing economic renewal thanks to streaming."
#directPR @fhollande "For the book, we must also accompany this mutation."
#directPR @fhollande "Copyright is the keystone of the creative finance system - all fields are concerned"
#directPR @fhollande "So we brought our proposals to the European Commission to define the new frameworks"
#directPR @fhollande "We need a single regulatory framework so that all players are on an equal footing"
#directPR @fhollande "In 2017, I wanted to give a strong boost to the budget for culture."
#directPR @fhollande "What is at stake is the place given to culture There can be no will without artistic education"
#directPR @fhollande "It's not only an education in arts and culture but through arts and culture"
#directPR @fhollande "This inauguration coincides with a tragic anniversary, that of January 11th"
#directPR @fhollande "Freedom has been called into question, culture has been targeted by terrorism, we must not forget anything about it."
#directPR @fhollande "The ability of the French people to stand up for freedom must not be forgotten"
#directPR @fhollande "Freedom is fragile, like democracy, it is never acquired."
#directPR @fhollande "We have a great responsibility because we are watched by every country in the world"
#directPR @fhollande "Our responsibility is to defend the circulation of ideas around the world"
#directPR @fhollande "Our country promotes a culture open to the world, which promotes dialogue and sharing"
#directPR @fhollande "Those who created these great institutions wanted to make the works available to the general public"
#directPR @fhollande "This restoration is a rebirth and the confirmation of a vocation We must open our institutions"
#directPR @fhollande "Democracy also means sharing science, culture Education is the condition of everything"
#directPR @fhollande "Nothing is ever completed, everything is transformed and continues to serve the French people"
